T02TD1648E:312b-0: @312b * // sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i sgrub thabs bzhugs /
T02TD1648E:312b-2: # // rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1648E:312b-3: dang por sngags pa bdag nyid kyi //
T02TD1648E:312b-4: zhal gdong dag par byas pas na //
T02TD1648E:312b-5: de ni 'jig rten pa yi lugs //
T02TD1648E:312b-7: snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la //
T02TD1648E:312b-8: nag po h'um ni bsam par bya //
T02TD1648E:312b-9: 'od zer rnam lngas khyab par spros //
T02TD1648E:312b-10: 'jig rten khams ni gsal byas nas //
T02TD1648E:312b-11: slar 'dus zhal ni dag par bya //
T02TD1648E:312b-12: de nas bsgom pa'i sa gzhi ni //
T02TD1648E:312b-13: bdud rtsi lngas ni gtor bar bya //
T02TD1648E:312b-14: de steng bde ba'i stan la 'dug / snying gar zla dkyil h'um ni bsam //
T02TD1648E:312b-16: rang bzhin dkyil 'khor spyan drangs nas //
T02TD1648E:312b-17: mdun gyi nam mkhar bsam par bya //
T02TD1648E:312b-18: rang gi snying ga'i h'um las ni //
T02TD1648E:312b-19: mkha' 'gro ma bzhi rab spros la //
T02TD1648E:312b-20: phyi nang mchod bstod la sogs bya//
T02TD1648E:312b-21: de nas sdig pa bshags par bya //
T02TD1648E:312b-22: lus ngag yid gsum las byas sdig / rang gi byas sogs sdig pa kun //
T02TD1648E:312b-23: rang bzhin dkyil 'khor dag pa bshags //
T02TD1648E:312b-24: sangs rgyas la sogs bsod nams la //
T02TD1648E:312b-25: rjes su yi rang ba byas nas //
T02TD1648E:312b-26: rjes su yi rang bsod nams 'dis //
T02TD1648E:313a-2: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi //
T02TD1648E:313a-3: byang chub sems ni rnam gnyis kyis //
T02TD1648E:313a-4: rang gi lus ngag yid gsum 'dis //
T02TD1648E:313a-5: sangs rgyas la sogs rnams la dbul //
T02TD1648E:313a-6: yan lag bdun mchod byas nas su //
T02TD1648E:313a-7: rang gi lus ngag yid gsum la //
T02TD1648E:313a-8: rang bzhin yi ge gsum 'di bsam //
T02TD1648E:313a-9: yi ge gsum ni 'di lta ste //
T02TD1648E:313a-10: he dang ru ni ka dang gsum //
T02TD1648E:313a-11: he zhes chos rnams rgyu med pa //
T02TD1648E:313a-12: ha zhes chos rnams skye 'gag med //
T02TD1648E:313a-13: ae zhes chos rnams smra brjod bral //
T02TD1648E:313a-14: ru zhes chos rnams brag ca 'dra //
T02TD1648E:313a-15: ra zhes yang dag bde chen lus //
T02TD1648E:313a-16: au zhes chos rnams mi rtog brten //
T02TD1648E:313a-17: k'a zhes chos rnams gnas med pa'o //
T02TD1648E:313a-18: ka zhes chos rnams bde dang ldan //
T02TD1648E:313a-19: aa las chos rnams skye med bstan //
T02TD1648E:313a-20: rang gi lus ngag yid gsum gyi //
T02TD1648E:313a-21: rang bzhin yi ge gsum po 'di //
T02TD1648E:313a-22: nan tan gyis ni de ltar bsgom //
T02TD1648E:313a-23: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bha ba a'atma ko& ham /
T02TD1648E:313a-24: stong nyid sems ni brtan byas nas //
T02TD1648E:313a-25: de nyid nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyur //
T02TD1648E:313a-26: de steng h'um nag bsam bya ste //
T02TD1648E:313a-27: de gyur rdo rjer bsgom par bya //
T02TD1648E:313a-28: rdo rje bum par h'um nag bsam //
T02TD1648E:313a-30: gru bzhi rdo rje brtsig byas te //
T02TD1648E:313a-31: steng du rdo rje gzeb bsams nas //
T02TD1648E:313a-32: 'og ni rdo rje sa gzhi ste //
T02TD1648E:313a-33: rdo rje ra ba'i phyi rol du //
T02TD1648E:313a-34: lam gyur sa gzhi gru bzhi ste //
T02TD1648E:313a-35: rdo rje rtse gsum gyis ni mtshan //
T02TD1648E:313a-36: sa yi dkyil 'khor phyi rol du //
T02TD1648E:313a-37: bam gyur chu yi dkyil 'khor zlum //
T02TD1648E:313a-38: de dbus bum pa dag tu bsam //
T02TD1648E:313a-39: chu yi dkyil 'khor phyi rol du //
T02TD1648E:313a-40: yam gyur rlung dkyil gzhu lta bur //
T02TD1648E:313a-41: g-yas g-yon ba dan mtshan par bya //
T02TD1648E:313a-42: yang na de yi phyi rol du //
T02TD1648E:313a-43: ram gyur me dkyil gru gsum bsam //
T02TD1648E:313a-44: rdo rje ra ba'i nang du ni //
T02TD1648E:313a-45: phyogs bzhi mtshams bzhi dag la ni //
T02TD1648E:313a-46: dur khrod brgyad ni bsam par bya //
T02TD1648E:313a-47: pam gyur padma dmar po bsam //
T02TD1648E:313a-49: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsam bar bya //
T02TD1648E:313a-50: dbus su mthing nag h'um ni bsam //
T02TD1648E:313a-51: h'um las 'od zer rab spros pas //
T02TD1648E:313a-52: phyogs bcu'i bde gshegs rnams bkug nas //
T02TD1648E:313b-0: h'um la thim nas @313b zhu bar gyur //
T02TD1648E:313b-2: lha mo bzhi ni bskyed par bya //
T02TD1648E:313b-3: tshad med bzhi yi rang bzhin las //
T02TD1648E:313b-4: rdo rje mkha' 'gro la sogs bzhis //
T02TD1648E:313b-5: 'di bzhi'i rdo rje glu yis ni //
T02TD1648E:313b-6: mnyam nyid la gnas bskul bar bya //
T02TD1648E:313b-7: dpal rdo rje glu'i dam pa'i srid pa shin tu sgrub byed pa //
T02TD1648E:313b-8: kye ma gnyen mchog rdo rje'i 'od kyis padma rab phye shig / aa la la la la ho //
T02TD1648E:313b-9: bde ba chen po rab tu dgyes pa'i gar mdzod cig / nyi ma'i 'od kyis padma'i kha rab phye ba bzhin //
T02TD1648E:313b-10: aa la la la la ho //
T02TD1648E:313b-11: bde ba chen po rab tu dgyes pa'i gar mdzod cig /
T02TD1648E:313b-12: rdo rje'i glu ni blangs nas su //
T02TD1648E:313b-13: gong bu de nyid h'um du gyur //
T02TD1648E:313b-14: de las 'od zer rab spros pas //
T02TD1648E:313b-15: phyogs bcu'i bde gshegs kun bkug nas //
T02TD1648E:313b-16: h'um nyid la ni thim par bsam //
T02TD1648E:313b-17: snying rje'i stobs kyis rdo rjer gyur //
T02TD1648E:313b-18: sku mdog mthing nag zhal bzhi pa //
T02TD1648E:313b-19: phyag bzhi dag gis rab tu mdzes //
T02TD1648E:313b-20: dbus zhal sku ni mthing nag ste //
T02TD1648E:313b-21: g-yas kyi zhal ser g-yon zhal ljang //
T02TD1648E:313b-22: lhag ma'i zhal ni dkar po'o //
T02TD1648E:313b-23: g-yas gnyis ka p'a la dang mda' //
T02TD1648E:313b-24: g-yon gnyis kha tv'am gzhu ni 'dzin //
T02TD1648E:313b-25: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gdan la bzhugs //
T02TD1648E:313b-26: zhal bzhi spyan ni gsum gsum ste //
T02TD1648E:313b-27: mi mgo gsar pa'i do shal la //
T02TD1648E:313b-28: rgyu ma rlon pa'i thag pas brgyus //
T02TD1648E:313b-29: thod skem phreng bas dbu la brgyan //
T02TD1648E:313b-30: rus chen rgyan dang yang dag ldan //
T02TD1648E:313b-31: dga' bzhad zhal gdangs mche ba gtsigs //
T02TD1648E:313b-32: dbu skra dmar ser gyen du 'bar //
T02TD1648E:313b-33: de nas gnas drug byin gyis brlab //
T02TD1648E:313b-34: dpral ba'i mtshams su tsi ser bsam //
T02TD1648E:313b-35: mig gnyis la ni aom dkar po //
T02TD1648E:313b-36: rna ba gnyis la a'a dmar bsam //
T02TD1648E:313b-37: sna gnyis la ni khe dkar po //
T02TD1648E:313b-38: mgrin par a'a:dmar bsam par bya //
T02TD1648E:313b-39: snying gar de dmar bsam par bya //
T02TD1648E:313b-40: gnas drug yang dag byin brlabs nas //
T02TD1648E:313b-41: yab yum sku ni dus gcig rdzogs //
T02TD1648E:313b-42: stong nyid la ni shin tu 'khyud //
T02TD1648E:313b-44: 'jig rten khams gsal byas nas ni //
T02TD1648E:313b-45: rdo rje 'dzin pas dbu ni brgyan //
T02TD1648E:313b-46: sku gsung thugs ni byin gyis brlabs //
T02TD1648E:314a-0: chos dbyings ye shes rnam dag gi / de yi ngo bo @314a * //
T02TD1648E:314a-3: rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma ni bsam //
T02TD1648E:314a-4: sku mdog mthing nag zhal bzhi ma //
T02TD1648E:314a-5: g-yas ser g-yon ljang gu yi zhal //
T02TD1648E:314a-6: lhag pa'i zhal ni dkar po ste //
T02TD1648E:314a-7: g-yon gnyis kha tv'am dril bu la //
T02TD1648E:314a-8: g-yas gnyis ka p'a la rdo rje //
T02TD1648E:314a-9: sa khams me long rang bzhin no //
T02TD1648E:314a-10: mdog ser rin chen mkha' 'gro ma //
T02TD1648E:314a-11: lho yi pad 'dab bsam par bya //
T02TD1648E:314a-12: g-yas nag g-yon ni ljang gu'i zhal //
T02TD1648E:314a-13: lhag pa'i zhal ni dkar po'o //
T02TD1648E:314a-14: g-yon gnyis pa dan ce sbyang ste //
T02TD1648E:314a-15: g-yas gnyis rtse gsum rin chen 'dzin //
T02TD1648E:314a-16: chu khams mnyam nyid rang bzhin no //
T02TD1648E:314a-18: nub kyi pang 'dab bsam par bya //
T02TD1648E:314a-19: g-yas ser g-yon ni ljang ba'i zhal //
T02TD1648E:314a-20: lhag pa'i zhal ni nag po ste //
T02TD1648E:314a-21: g-yon gnyis gzhu dang ka p'a la //
T02TD1648E:314a-22: g-yas gnyis mda' dang sna tshogs pad //
T02TD1648E:314a-23: me khams so sor rtog rang bzhin //
T02TD1648E:314a-24: ljang mdog sna tshogs mkha' 'gro ma //
T02TD1648E:314a-25: byang gi pad 'dab bsam par bya //
T02TD1648E:314a-26: g-yas ser g-yon ni sngo ba'i zhal //
T02TD1648E:314a-27: lhag pa'i zhal ni dkar po'o //
T02TD1648E:314a-28: g-yon gnyis zhags pa ka p'a la 'dzin //
T02TD1648E:314a-29: g-yas gnyis ral gri cang te'u 'dzin //
T02TD1648E:314a-30: rlung khams nan tan rang bzhin no //
T02TD1648E:314a-31: rdo rje mkha' 'gro la sogs bzhi //
T02TD1648E:314a-32: nye ma'i gdan la rab tu gnas //
T02TD1648E:314a-33: ka p'a la sogs rgyan rnams ni //
T02TD1648E:314a-34: gtso bo'i rgyan dang mthun par bshad //
T02TD1648E:314a-35: spyan ni gtso bo nyid dang mthun //
T02TD1648E:314a-36: cung zad zhal gdangs mche gtsigs la //
T02TD1648E:314a-37: dbu skra dmar ser gyen du 'bar //
T02TD1648E:314a-38: thams cad kyi ni sku rnams la //
T02TD1648E:314a-40: snying rje'i stobs kyi rdo rje ba //
T02TD1648E:314a-41: lha mo 'di bzhis mdzes bskor bsgom //
T02TD1648E:314a-42: ji ltar rdzogs pa'i rim pa ni //
T02TD1648E:314a-43: slob dpon dag la dri bar bya //
T02TD1648E:314a-44: spyi bor rlung gi dkyil 'khor bsam //
T02TD1648E:314a-45: snying gar sa yi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD1648E:314a-46: lte bar chu yi dkyil 'khor bsam //
T02TD1648E:314a-47: gsang bar me yi dkyil 'khor te //
T02TD1648E:314a-48: ma ning gis ni bsgom par bya //
T02TD1648E:314a-50: rnal 'byor pa ni ngal bso'i phyir //
T02TD1648E:314a-51: sngags kyi 'dzab ni bzlas par bya //
T02TD1648E:314a-53: ting nge 'dzin las langs nas ni //
T02TD1648E:314a-55: gnyis su med par bsgom par bya //
T02TD1648E:314a-56: rgya gar gyi mkhan po sku med rdo rjes mdzad pa sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
